#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
int main()
{
    char monthrecord[][12]={"January","Feburary","March","April","May","June","July","August","September","Octuber","November","December"};
    int day,year,sum,sum1,i;
    char month[10];
    sum=sum1=0;
    scanf("%d%s%d",&day,month,&year);
    for(i=0;i<12;i++)
    {
        if(strcmp(month,monthrecord[i])==0)
        {
            sum=day*(i+1)+year;
            break;
        }
    }
    while(1)
    {
        if((sum%10)!=0||(sum/10)!=0)
        {
            sum1+=sum%10;
            sum/=10;
        }
        else
        {
            if(sum1/10!=0)
            {
                sum=sum1;
                sum1=0;
            }
            else
            {
                break;
            }
        }
    }
    printf("%d\n",sum1);
    return 0;
}
